hr.p: If your spouse or partner is an essential worker and you need emergency childcare the Framingham YMCA is accepting children, provided that all other avenues have been explored. Here is a link to the page.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 14pt; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

a.title: Click here

a.span: How to Apply for Unemployment Benefits

span.style: font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

hr.p:
Visit www.theEAP.com/Educators-EAP and click on the Employee & Family login in the top menu bar.
To speak to a counselor or to arrange for coaching, call 800-252-4555.
